name: CTPulmonaryAngiogramCTPA
title: CT Pulmonary Angiogram CTPA
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a computed tomography (CT) pulmonary angiogram, or a CT for pulmonary embolism.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnostic Study.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a CT pulmonary angiogram, CT of the chest which may be used to show pulmonary embolus, and other related concepts.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
